thread.title: RONALD KOON
thread.title_full: Brushy Mountain Bee Farm reviewed by RONALD KOON

author: RONALD KOON
title: RONALD KOON
text:
I ordered and received 100 Eastern Orchard Mason Bee Cocoons, which were packaged well and arrived safely well packed with ice pack.
The pack was milted but was still cool after several days transit. Also purchased the laminated Field Guide which is really easier for me to remember when and what happens for better management on my part.
In addition I got the Paper back book, The Orchard Mason Bee which is a must have. Now I feel well informed as a new guy so I will understand more of the little guys life cycle. Also a must have.
I have faith in Brushy MT and will be ordering more from them. Thanks.
